channel.title: Can you not turn on a psp game?
channel.description:
Hello,
I am playing the medal of honour game, and I cant find a way to turn, is this how psp's work?
Thanks

item.title: Can you not turn on a psp game?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Life Java Is My Life™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Life wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:4, topic:247339”][quote author=I james I link=topic=326326.msg2556824#msg2556824 date=1227952063]

I haven’t tried MoH for PSP yet, but I’m guessing that you can use the analog stick.

Ok, where is the best place to download demos? and what ones do you recommend?
[/quote]
You can always download demos from http://www.pspdemocenter.com/list.php?c=pcdown, if you got a USB cable that is.[/quote]

No need if you have a PS3, The PS3 controller charger USB works on PSP.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you not turn on a psp game?

item.title: Can you not turn on a psp game?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:13, topic:247339”][quote author=cooper link=topic=326326.msg2566852#msg2566852 date=1228435107]

I’d recommend custom firmware and getting the full game instead of demos.

I have a little question according to downloaded games on firmware, can you play online like you can with some bought games?

Yep, it works the same.
[/quote]
Cool, I might buy a pandoras battery some day. I saw some video how to make one with the PSP Fat battery(the one I got), but it can get fucked up.[/quote]
It’s not too hard, I had to do it for my friend who had a TA-082 motherboard, then I did it again for another friend today. The battery and magic memory stick are reversible so I just used their normal ones.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you not turn on a psp game?

item.title: Can you not turn on a psp game?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

I james I:

Oh so when you are internet browsing and it says “There is not enough memory” getting a bigger memory stick would fix that problem?

I would think so. I have a 32MB memory card and it really pisses me of when the pages don’t load nicely.

So, getting a bigger memory card would be good in any way I can think of.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you not turn on a psp game?

item.title: Can you not turn on a psp game?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“lordbost, post:5, topic:247339”][quote author=PeterMan link=topic=326326.msg2556828#msg2556828 date=1227952184]

I haven’t tried MoH for PSP yet, but I’m guessing that you can use the analog stick.

Ok, where is the best place to download demos? and what ones do you recommend?

You can always download demos from http://www.pspdemocenter.com/list.php?c=pcdown, if you got a USB cable that is.
[/quote]
I think you can go this site whit your psp browser, and download directly to your psp[/quote]
Yeah, deepending on his memory stick space, most internet sites should load nicely.

Read full topic
